If you have to use VLC, try these magic steps:

1) Load the game with VLC
2) Pause the game when it goes to 11 seconds
3) Go to "Video" - "Video Track", you will see "Track 1" is ticked there, yeah, just untick it
4) Now tick "Track 1" again
5) Resume the play, VLC should be able to play it correctly this time.

Basically, ANY other media players will play the rip correctly without any extra steps.
